import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete an account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/account/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete handles HTTP DELETE requests to remove an account by its ID.
It expects an account ID as a URL parameter, validates the format,
and delegates the deletion to the account service.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Account ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Account removed","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"422":{"description":"Unprocessable Entity","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
